    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkGameState

        public NetworkGameState​(StateManager stateManager,
                        java.lang.String address,
                        boolean isHost)
        Sets up server connection, player model, gui, and world map. If isHost is true, sets up the ball and starts the server.
        Parameters:
        stateManager - - its managing state manager

        Parameters:
